content.en: DFIG optimization: Researchers have been investigating how to model and simulate wind power generation schemes using a doubly fed induction generator (DFIG) and improve their capabilities. They have developed algorithms, such as the stator flux vector control algorithm, to control the rotor current and enhance the reactive power compensation and active filtering capabilities of DFIG-based Wind Energy Conversion Systems (WECS). These algorithms aim to improve the power quality, control operation, and low voltage ride-through capability of wind power systems, ultimately making them more efficient and reliable.
content.da: DFIG-optimering: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan man modellerer og simulerer vindkraftproduktionssystemer ved hjælp af en dobbeltmadsinduktionsgenerator (DFIG) og forbedrer deres kapacitet. De har udviklet algoritmer, såsom statorfluxvektorkontrolalgoritmen, til at kontrollere rotorstrømmen og forbedre den reaktive effektkompensation og aktive filtreringskapaciteter i DFIG-baserede Vindenergiomformingssystemer (WECS). Disse algoritmer har til formål at forbedre strømkvaliteten, styre driften og lav spænding ride-through evne af vindkraftsystemer og i sidste ende gøre dem mere effektive og pålidelige.
